definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Their testimony and cross-examination were uneventful.
sentences.chinese: 他們的作證和盤問是平淡無事的。

sentences.english: Mr. Alvarez has not yet been called to testify.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾瓦雷斯尚未被法庭傳喚作證。

sentences.english: He showed his identity card and went in.
sentences.chinese: 他把工作證亮了一下就進去了。

sentences.english: I have also been an expert witness at a tragic accident when a belay failed.
sentences.chinese: 我也一直是確保失敗這種悲慘意外發生時的作證專家。

sentences.english: So the heaven testify, I already wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 所以蒼天作證，我已全心全意。

sentences.english: The gun the prosecutors used must have been a plant.
sentences.chinese: 起訴方用來作證的那支槍肯定是栽贓的。

sentences.english: Yes, he could testify if need be.
sentences.chinese: 是的，如果有需要的話，他可以作證。

sentences.english: In reality Ryder never testified at the trial.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，賴德在審判中從未爲自己作證。

sentences.english: Gina had to appear in court because she witnessed a crime.
sentences.chinese: 吉娜必須出庭作證，因爲她目擊了一件刑案。

sentences.english: Many of the soldiers are still doing their compulsory national service.
sentences.chinese: 作證的士兵大多是現役軍人。

sentences.english: He was summoned as a witness.
His friends will testify for him.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友們將爲他作證。

sentences.english: Whether the witness appears to testify is of great influence to the trial.
sentences.chinese: 是否出咶作證對於案件的審理有很大影響。

sentences.english: They suborn witnesses to testify that he has spoken against Moses and the Temple.
sentences.chinese: 他們收買證人作證說，他已表示反對摩西和聖殿。

sentences.english: Then the court adjourns to deliberate onwhether any witnesses should be heard.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，法庭休庭，商討是否應該提請任何證人作證。

definition: persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to speak in defense of/to argue in favor of/to defend/to plead
public prosecutor/public procurator (judicial officer whose job may involve both criminal investigation and public prosecution)
